nodes.text: Mudhorns were large horned creatures whose main habitat was the desert.

The average mudhorn had grey skin, brown wool, brown eyes, a large horn, and spikes along its back. There was also a known variant of hairless mudhorn. The mudhorn was a territorial creature by nature and it was considered hard to domesticate them.
Mudhorns were saddled and ridden by the time of the Third Galactic War.

Mudhorns first appeared in Star Wars Legends as a purchasable mount in BioWare's Star Wars: The Old Republic, with the game's update 6.1.4 on October 20, 2020. The mudhorn was originally introduced in the 2019 canon Disney+ series The Mandalorian.
